Metadata.title: Webiston | Free Courses and Tools for Developers
Metadata.description: A modern platform for learning programming. High-quality, free courses on React and useful tools for developers in Uzbek and English.
Metadata.keywords: free courses, programming, React, JavaScript, developer tools, learn to code, Uzbek IT, free education

HomePage.title: A deep dive into the world of web technologies
HomePage.description: Webiston is a non-commercial project that provides high-quality, modern, and free educational resources in the Uzbek language. We offer in-depth courses on React and a collection of useful tools for developers.
HomePage.reactSectionDescription: An in-depth guide to the React library, from the basics to the most advanced concepts, available for free in Uzbek.
HomePage.toolsSectionDescription: A collection of handy online tools to make every developer's daily tasks easier.
HomePage.jsSectionDescription: A comprehensive course on modern JavaScript. Coming soon...

Metadata.description: Webiston - In-depth knowledge and practical guides on Web Technologies, React, Next.js, JavaScript. Learn programming with us.
Metadata.keywords: React, Next.js, JavaScript, programming, web development, tutorial, guide, webiston, learn to code, react tutorial, nextjs tutorial, javascript tutorial

Metadata.title: Developer Tools | Webiston
Metadata.description: A collection of free and useful online tools for developers. Includes converters, code generators, formatters, and much more for daily tasks.
Metadata.keywords: developer tools, online tools, free tools, converters, generators, JSON formatter, Base64 converter, color converter

whatIsJson.title: What is JSON?
whatIsJson.description: JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a lightweight and readable format for storing and transmitting data. It is widely used in modern web applications and APIs.

Errors.unexpectedEnd: JSON is incomplete. Check brackets or quotes.

whatIsUrlEncoding.title: What is URL Encoding?
whatIsUrlEncoding.description: URL Encoding (Percent Encoding) is a method to convert characters with special meaning in URLs into a format that can be transmitted safely over the Internet.

usage.title: Usage Areas
usage.usage1: • Creating valid URLs with special characters

Errors.invalidUrlFormat: Invalid URL format. Check the syntax.
Errors.urlDecodeError: Error decoding URL. Check format correctness.
Errors.fileSizeError: File size must be less than 10MB.
Errors.fileReadError: Error occurred while reading file content.
Errors.fileTypeError: Only text files can be uploaded.

whatIsBase64.title: What is Base64?
whatIsBase64.description: Base64 is an encoding method for representing binary data in text format. It uses 64 characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, +, /

Errors.invalidBase64Format: Invalid Base64 format. Use only A-Z, a-z, 0-9, +, / and = characters.
Errors.invalidBase64Text: Invalid Base64 format. Check that the text is properly encoded.
Errors.base64DecodeError: Error decoding Base64. Check format correctness.
Errors.fileSizeError: File size must be less than 10MB.
Errors.imageReadError: Error occurred while reading image file.
Errors.fileReadError: Error occurred while reading file content.
Errors.encodeFileTypeError: Only text and image files can be uploaded.
Errors.decodeFileTypeError: Only text files can be uploaded for decoding.

Info.title: About Latin-Cyrillic Alphabet
Info.description: Information required for writing in the Uzbek language.

latinAlphabet.title: Latin Alphabet
latinAlphabet.description: The writing system officially used in Uzbekistan since 1992.
latinAlphabet.featureDesc: Convenient for typing on a computer

cyrillicAlphabet.title: Cyrillic Alphabet
cyrillicAlphabet.description: Used during the Soviet era and still applied in some fields.

history.title: Historical Information
history.note: After gaining independence, Uzbekistan returned to the Latin alphabet.

usage.title: Usage Areas
usage.note: Both alphabets have their place and are important.

tips.title: Useful Tips
tips.tip1: • Enter the full text, then convert
tips.tip4: • Can be saved as a file
tips.note: Prepare the text carefully for professional results.
